Fujitsu SPARClite targets

The Cygnus Developer's Kit supports the SPARClite family as a variant of the support for SPARC. For the compiler in particular, special configuration options allow you to use special software floating-point code (for the Fujitsu MB86930 chip), as well as defaulting command-line options to use special SPARClite features.

Cgynus currently supports the ex930, ex931, ex932, ex933, ex934, and the ex936 boards.

  • Ftools: What to call the tools
  • Fcompile: Compiling on the Fujitsu SPARClite target family
  • Fdebug: Debugging on the Fujitsu SPARClite target family
  • Fload: Loading on specific target architectures
  • Fdoc: Documentation on the Fujitsu SPARClite target family
